title: Carl Flesch Plus Scales for Viola Volume I
description: Double-Stop 3rds and 6ths in all keys. Collated and Fingered by Mark Knight

text.head: Carl Flesch Plus Scales System for Viola

body.p1: For several decades the "Carl Flesch Scales System" for both violin and viola has been a central technical manual for aspiring, advanced and professional players and teachers of these string instruments. However it has become increasingly clear that the "system" needs upgrading for 21st Century applications, and the opportunity has been taken to clarify the essential principles that Flesch outlines in his "Art of Violin Playing" to which the Scale System was an explanatory and practise supplement.
